title: Facebook makes a Substack competitor, Netflix's carbon footprint and the future of McKinsey
description:
Kara and Scott discuss scandals at Substack as Facebook builds a newsletter competitor. They also discuss a new tool that is measuring the carbon footprint of streaming on Netflix and what that means for the industry. In listener mail, we get a question about whether McKinsey is still the gold standard for early career success.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
